#summary API Methods

= Methods List =

The following table lists the API methods that are currently available:

|| *Method* || *Description* ||
|| _profile_ || Returns the user's public profile ||
|| _profile_favorites_ || Returns the list of favorite videos that appear on a user's profile page ||
|| _profile_friends_ || Returns the list of favorite friends that appear on a user's profile page ||
|| _profile_shares_ || Returns the list of recently shared videos that appear on a user's profile page ||
|| _profile_shows_ || Returns the list of favorite TV shows that appear on a user's profile page ||
|| _personality_ || Returns the video personality type that appears on a user's profile page ||
